user: I want to manage an existing booking
agent:
Welcome to HDFC Mutual Funds Advisor Scheduler. Please note this service is for informational purposes only and does not constitute investment advice.

I can certainly help you manage your existing booking. To locate your appointment, could you please provide your **Booking Code** (e.g., NL-X99Z)? 

Alternatively, if you don't have the code handy, you can provide the **name (alias)** used for the booking along with the **date and time** of the appointment.
